description: This modpack is my first so don't be scared it's not gregefied or something like that.
But if you have some feedback or suggestions everything is welcome and you can head to the modritnh page,
there is a link to either the github page or my discord server.
Either way, if you complete this quest the pack will be started and I wish you good luck cause
there's a angry being waiting for you

title.translate: Some things I have to say
